sentence: Polling shows Trump-endorsed Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker (R) leading incumbent Sen. Raphael Warnock (D-Ga.) despite Walkers campaign being plagued by a series of gaffes, like Walkers assertion that the existence of apes is evidence that evolution is not real.
author: Nicholas Reimann
title: Trump Reportedly Backing J.D. Vance In Ohio Senate RaceLatest Test Of Dubious Endorsement Power

sentence: This follows his endorsement of Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvanias Senate Republican primary and Herschel Walker in the Georgia Senate race.
author: Robert Reich
title: Were running out of time to hold Donald Trump accountable

sentence: And some worry that Trump's picks, like former football star Herschel Walker in Georgia, could prove too controversial to prevail against Democrats in November, imperiling their bid for Senate control.
author: Nathan Layne
title: Ohio Senate primary a test of Trump's grip on Republican voters
